long_description: The Nathan Human Propulsion Laboratories (HPL) #020 Race hydration vest is engineered to keep you hydrated without slowing you down. Harness moves in harmony with your shoulder and upper-back movements, reducing wasted energy. Mesh shoulder straps and back panel channel air across your skin and wick moisture away to improve overall comfort. Insulated reservoir compartment zips open and provides quick, easy access to 2-liter reservoir (included). Bite Me(TM) valve is bent at a 90deg angle; can be easily shut off with a quick twist. Dual front pockets include one that's zippered to secure keys, ID or cash while the other stashes energy gels in a stretchy mesh pocket. 2 zippered rear compartments organize additional items.
short_description: The Nathan Human Propulsion Laboratories (HPL) #020 Race hydration vest is engineered to keep you hydrated without slowing you down.
